title: Gangplank?
body:
Is he viable in Ranked Solo Queue?Is he worth One Tricking?Is he a good TOP/MID laner?
You know what I'm talking about.
Tobias notice me senpai xD

replies.body:
He's alright.

survive laning phase and everything will basically be smooth as you scale into god.
You know what you're talking about, I see. XD

{{champion:41}} is OP, definitely worth OTP.

he can work top + mid no problems.
